argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumsubmclOLD.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumsubmclOLD.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 3 |  | gsumsubmclOLD.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | gsumsubmclOLD.s | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 5 |  | gsumsubmclOLD.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) |
| 6 |  | gsumsubmclOLD.w | |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_submss | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) -> S C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( F : A --> S /\ S C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> F : A --> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 14 | 5, 12, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> F : A --> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 7, 2, 14 | #P_cntzcmnf | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ran F ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 7, 9, 3, 4, 5, 15, 6 | #P_gsumzsubmclOLD | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) |
